00046     class XDR {
00047     public:
00049       typedef unsigned int           block_type;
00050 
00051     public:
00052 
00054       XDR(std::iostream* s) : stream(s), need_to_swab(false) {
00055         int test = 0x1234;
00056         if (*(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&test)) == 0x34) {
00057           need_to_swab = true;
00058         }
00059       }
00060 
00062       std::iostream* get(void) { return(stream); }
00063 
00065       template<typename T> uint read(T* p) {
00066 
00067         if (sizeof(T) > sizeof(block_type))
00068           throw(std::logic_error("Attempting to read a POD that is too large"));
00069 
00070         T result;
00071         stream->read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&result), sizeof(block_type));
00072         if (sizeof(T) > 1 && need_to_swab)
00073           result = swab(result);
00074 
00075         *p = result;
00076         return(!stream->fail());
00077       }
00078 
00079       template<typename T> uint read(T& t) { return(read(&t)); }
00080 
00082       template<typename T> uint read(T* ary, const uint n) {
00083         uint i;
00084         for (i=0; i<n && read(ary+i); ++i) ;
00085         return(i);
00086       }
00087 
00088 
00090       uint read(char* p, uint n) {
00091         uint rndup;
00092         static char buf[sizeof(block_type)];
00093 
00094         if (n == 0)
00095           return(1);
00096 
00097         rndup = n % sizeof(block_type);
00098         if (rndup > 0)
00099           rndup = sizeof(block_type) - rndup;
00100 
00101         stream->read(p, n);
00102         if (stream->fail())
00103           return(0);
00104         if (rndup)
00105           stream->read(buf, rndup);
00106 
00107         return(n);
00108       }
00109 
00111 
00112       uint read(boost::shared_ptr<char>& p) {
00113         uint n;
00114 
00115         if (!read(n))
00116           return(0);
00117         char* s = new char[n+1];
00118         uint i = read(s, n);
00119         s[n] = '\0';
00120         p = boost::shared_ptr<char>(s);
00121         return(i);
00122       }
00123 
00124       uint read(std::string& s) {
00125         boost::shared_ptr<char> p;
00126         int i = read(p);
00127         if (!i)
00128           return(0);
00129 
00130         s = std::string(p.get());
00131 
00132         return(i);
00133       }
00134

00136       // -----------------------------------------------------

00139       template<typename T> uint write(const T* p) {
00140 
00141         if (sizeof(T) > sizeof(block_type))
00142           throw(std::logic_error("Attempting to write a POD that is too large"));
00143 
00144         uint u;
00145         T* up = reinterpret_cast<T*>(&u);
00146         *up = *p;
00147 
00148         if (sizeof(T) > 1 && need_to_swab)
00149           u = swab(u);
00150 
00151     
00152         stream->write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&u), sizeof(block_type));
00153 
00154         return(!stream->fail());
00155       }
00156 
00157       template<typename T> uint write(const T& t) { return(write(&t)); }
00158 
00160       template<typename T> uint write(const T* ary, const uint n) {
00161         uint i;
00162         for (i=0; i<n && write(&(ary[i])); ++i) ;
00163         return(i);
00164       }
00165 
00167       uint write(const char* p, const uint n) {
00168         uint rndup;
00169         static char buf[sizeof(block_type)];
00170         static bool init(false);
00171 
00172         if (!init)
00173           for (uint i=0; i<sizeof(block_type); ++i)
00174             buf[i] = '\0';
00175 
00176         rndup = n % sizeof(block_type);
00177         if (rndup > 0)
00178           rndup = sizeof(block_type) - rndup;
00179 
00180         stream->write(p, n);
00181         if (!stream->fail())
00182           stream->write(buf, rndup);
00183 
00184         return(stream->fail() ? 0 : n);
00185       }
00186 
00188       uint write(const char* p) {
00189         uint n = strlen(p);
00190         write(n);
00191         return(write(p, n));
00192       }
00193 
00194       uint write(const std::string& s) { return(write(s.c_str())); }
00195 
00196     private:
00197       std::iostream* stream;
00198       bool need_to_swab;
00199 
00200     };
